title: Random Summoner Invited to Club and Cannot Remove
body: I created a club and a Summoner who is not on my friends list has been on the pending invites list since I created it. I am unable to revoke the invite as it states that they are not part of my club and cannot be removed. I was wondering whether anyone has come across this and whether there are any resolutions to this issue. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Just had a Rioter look into this for you, there is definitely a pending invite on your club. Unfortunately there is no way for them to remove it for you, however as a club owner or officer you should be able to revoke the invite yourself.

Scroll down to the bottom of your club chat and you should see the list of pending invites, right click on the summoner and select "Revoke".

If the above doesn't work, try making someone else in your club an officer and seeing if they can revoke the invite.
If neither you or one of your officers are able to revoke the invite we're going to need a screenshot of the error you're receiving for further investigation.
Seems to have resolved itself after the patch. Thanks for the reply though.
